name: Timeline of the Universe
description:
This isn't a game per se like my other projects, just something I made for a competition that I thought I would put on here too.  
PLEASE USE FULLSCREEN
Timeline of the Universe : 

How To Use:

Use the mouse and drag to move through the timeline.
Click each mark on the timeline to get information on what happened at that time.
Press Space to zoom out and see the whole timeline. From the whole timeline view, click on any point on the timeline to zoom into that point.

Have Fun!
